mapper.select: /* login.selectUserInfo : 사용자 로그인 정보 조회*/ SELECT A.USER_ID AS USER_ID , A.USER_NO , A.USER_NM , A.EMAIL , A.AREA_CODE , USER_STTUS_CODE , PASSWORD ,'R010070' AS AREA_SE_CODE_L ,IFNULL(AREA_SE_CODE_S ,'') AS AREA_SE_CODE_S ,IFNULL(AREA_SE_CODE_D ,'') AS AREA_SE_CODE_D ,AUTHOR_ID AS AUTHOR_ID FROM op_user A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{id}
